home_subtitle: Frontend Developer creating modern, responsive web experiences.
home_description: I craft modern, interactive web experiences with clean code and creative solutions. Specialized in frontend & backend development.
intro_text: Versatile Software Developer with experience in frontend and backend development, specializing in Angular, React.js, ASP.NET Core, and TypeScript. Skilled in building scalable APIs, creating responsive UIs, and working in Agile/Scrum teams. Currently expanding expertise in React Native to deliver cross-platform mobile applications.
about_text: I am a passionate software developer specialized in frontend technologies, including Angular, React, React Native, and TypeScript. With experience in ASP.NET Web API, MVC, and PostgreSQL, I create efficient, user-friendly applications. I thrive on solving complex problems, continuously learning, and collaborating with teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
experience_subtitle: My professional journey in software development
